name: Texas Instruments Incorporated
goal: Texas Instruments provides innovative semiconductor technologies to help our customers create the worlds most advanced electronics. Our analog and embedded processing technologies permeate daily life in many ways, from digital communications and entertainment to medical services, automotive systems, as well as to applications for smart manufacturing and wide ranging applications in-between.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Ecodesign, Horizon2020, REACH, RoHS, Digital Single Market, Energy Union, GDPR, Digitizing European Industry, Cybersecurity, Digital Skills,
